title: aram suggestion
body: when we reroll id like it so the rerolled champ is only available to you for 5 seconds so if you reroll and get a bad champ you can switch back and no one else can take it from you

replies.body: I can second this. Often times, the connection is bad or the client is lagging (heh...the CLIENT IS LAGGING???? Never thought I'd say that about a game!). And some computers are just slow when trying to run the beast that is LoL client. I'm not the target-audience pro-player with a usd$4000 computer that will  actually run this client smoothly enough to make it an enjoyable experience, so this occurs  often enough for me to most definitely feel you on this.
